content:
Understand How Default Values for Case Emails Work

There are lots of ways to control the default values your agents see when responding to customer cases using email. Depending on your business needs, you can set up different types of default field values using various methods.

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience
Available in: Group, Professional, Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

You can set defaults with:

Apex QuickActionDefaultsHandler interface - to override email field values based on complex logic.
Predefined Field Values set up for the Email quick action - to add people to email threads or ensure emails are associated with Salesforce records.
Automatic Reply, Reply All, and Forward field values - to auto-populate fields like To, From, Subject, and Body fields.
Default Email Template set up for the Email quick action - to apply a custom email template to the body of the email.

DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
title: Understanding Default Case Email Settings in Service Cloud
